options: ['a French school', 'a Chinese school', 'a Japanese school', 'an English school']
article:
Mary is an English girl, but she lives  in China. She is six. Her mother says to her, "You are six now, Mary, and you are going to school. I think it is very good. It's a nice school."
"Is it a Chinese school?" Mary asks.
"Yes, it is." Her mother says.
It is September and the new school year begins. Mary goes to school every day. She likes her lessons and her classmates  very much. Her classmates like her, too. Mary can speak a little Chinese. She likes China. She likes the people of China and Chinese food very much.
